text: Bad Friedrichshall is a small townin the district of Heilbronn, Baden- WÃ¼rttemberg, Germany. It has about 18,000 inhabitants. Bad Friedrichshall is at the confluence of the Neckar and the Kocher, north of Heilbronn. Bad Friedrichshall is famous for its salt-mine. ==References== == Other websites ==
title: Bad Friedrichshall
